Posts.Content: Hi Fiona (would you believe I'm a Fiona too!!!) I've just been diagnosed with early stage BC, going in for surgery on 23rd Dec. I have been invited to take part in Posnoc trial too. I've watched the video and info that the nurse gave me and would like to take part (subject to whether the cancer has spread to the nodes. I've been trying to contact someone who can give me further advice but for the Â the past 2 days have been unsuccessful (i know the nurses are busy but seriously!) All I want to know is whether you are told which group you are in
Posts.Title: POSNOC Trial for BC spread to sentinel nodes- thoughts?
